name: Mokjat
description:
[THIS IS ONE MAN JOB]
[EVERY KIND OF SUPPORT IS ACCEPTED] [WARNING: CAN CONTAIN REMAINS OF SLIMES, COMPSUME WITH MODERATION]

This is an prototype version, made only to show some of the game mechanics,
almost everything is subject to change.

#Info
Top Down action game with RPG Elements, 2 player co-op(Might become 4), cool bosses(Not yet D':), and some stoop enemys.
In this version you can test three rooms and a boss fight, you'll fight enemys, die, to finally, reach the exit.

|Gamepad
-Left Stick > Move
-A > Dodge
-X > Attack
-B > Interact

P2(Can Use Gamepad Assigned To The Second Slot)
-Numpad_9 > Join
-Arrow Keys > Move
-Numpad_2 > Dodge
-Numpad_1 > Attack
-Numpad_3 > Interact

#Secret Codes(Don't tell anyone)
B+U+G > Add EXP.
S+H+R > Become green + Permanent pickup color change.
G+A+B > Everybody praises him.

Credits:
I made all the sprites and stuff.
I made the music with "LLMS".
The gaben music was made by: "Mastgrr".

Game powered by "Game Maker: Studio"
